      • isProbablyEncryptedSMS

        public boolean isProbablyEncryptedSMS()
        This method checks if the message is a probably encrypted message by testing the encrypted byte
        Returns:
        true if it is probably encrypted otherwise it returns false

      • isProbablyKeyExchangeSMS

        public boolean isProbablyKeyExchangeSMS()
        This method checks if the incoming sms contains a public key of another contact by testing the first two bytes.
        Returns:
        true if it is probably a key, otherwise false

      • repairSMSLength

        public void repairSMSLength()
        Because of the Base123 encoding it may happens, that leading zeros will be removed. The ensure the richt SMS length, this method append as much zero bytes between detection byte and IV as needed.
